name: Indicator (Type File - MD5) - Get Reputation
description: Get Reputation of File identified by MD5 hash

steps.name: Start
steps.description: Indicator reputation is set as 'TBD' by 'Create and Link Indicator' utility playbook. We can ignore those indicators when triggering this PB

steps.name: Get File Reputation from Symantec Deepsight Intelligence

params.value:
{% if vars.foundDeepsightReputation%}

Symantec Deepsight Intelligence
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_Symantec_Deepsight_Intelligence.data.result.reputation}}
Detection: {{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_Symantec_Deepsight_Intelligence.data.result.detectionName}}

{% endif %}

{% if vars.foundAVReputation %}

Alien Vault Summary

Tags
{{(vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_AlienVault_OTX.data.results | json_query("[*].tags[]") | unique | string).replace("[","").replace("]","")}}

{% endif %}

{% if vars.foundAnomaliReputation %}

Anomali Threatstream Detection Summary

{%if vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].threatscore !=0 %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].threatscore}}
Severity: {{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}
{%else%}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].threatscore}}
Severity: {{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}{% endif %}

{% endif %}

VirusTotal Detection Summary

Title of the document {{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}/{{(vars.last_analysis_stats.values() | list ) [0:6] | sum}}
Malicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}
Suspicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.suspicious}}
Harmless
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.harmless}}
Community Votes
Harmless {{vars.community_votes.harmless}}
Malicious {{vars.community_votes.malicious}}

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

params.value:
Additional Information

{% if (vars.tags | length > 0) %}

Virustotal Tags
Tags
{{(vars.tags| string).replace("(","").replace(")","")}}

{% endif %}


{%if (vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_VT.data.attributes.signature_info != None and vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation_from_VT.data.attributes.signature_info)%}
Signature Information
{{vars.steps.Compute_VT_Signature_Info.data}}
{%endif%} {%if (vars.sandbox_verdict != None and vars.sandbox_verdict) %}
Sandbox Summary
{{vars.steps.Compute_Sandbox_Verdict_from_VT.data}}
{%endif%}
File Basic Properties
{{vars.steps.Compute_Basic_Properties.data}}

routes.name: Configuration -> Get File Reputation from Anomali
Get File Reputation from Symantec Deepsight Intelligence -> Compute Symantec Summary
Configuration -> Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX
Configuration -> Get File Reputation from Symantec Deepsight Intelligence
Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX -> Copy  of Compute Anomali Summary
Get File Reputation from Anomali -> Compute Anomali Summary
Configuration -> Get File Reputation from VT
Get File Reputation from VT -> Compute VT Summary
Compute AV OTX Summary -> Is Malicious
Compute VT Summary -> Compute Basic Properties
Compute Basic Properties -> Compute VT Signature Info
Compute Sandbox Verdict from VT -> Compute Additional Summary
sandbox_detection -> Compute Sandbox Verdict from VT
Get License Details -> Is MSSP Environment
Is MSSP Environment -> Is Tenant Shared
routes.label: Yes
